00027 #ifndef _MSG_QUEUE_H
00028 #define _MSG_QUEUE_H
00029 
00030 #ifdef  _MSG_QUEUE_C
00031 #define MSG_EXT
00032 #else
00033 
00034 #define MSG_EXT    extern
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 /*************************************************************************
00038 * INCLUDES
00039 *************************************************************************/
00040 #include "fb_hardware.h"
00041 #include <stdlib.h>
00042 #include <stdbool.h>
00043 #include <fb.h>
00044 
00045 /**************************************************************************
00046 * DEFINITIONS
00047 **************************************************************************/
00049 #define MSG_MAX_DATA_LENGTH 25
00050 
00051 /* Flags for msg */
00052 #define MSG_AUTOFREE     (1<<0)  
00053 #define MSG_HI_PRIO      (1<<1)  
00054 #ifdef FB_RF
00055 #define MSG_FROM_RF      (1<<2)  
00056 #define MSG_OWN          (1<<3)  
00057 #define RF_BLOCK1_LENGTH 12      /* 10 + crc */
00058 #define RF_BLOCK2_LENGTH 18      /* 16 + crc */
00059 #define RF_BLOCK3_LENGTH 10      /*  8 + crc */
00060 #define RF_MAX_DATA_LENGTH  (RF_BLOCK1_LENGTH+RF_BLOCK2_LENGTH+RF_BLOCK3_LENGTH)
00061 #endif
00062 
00064 #define COUNT_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(x) (sizeof(x)/sizeof(x[0]))
00065 
00067 enum emsg_state {
00068      MSG_FREE = 0x00,   
00069      MSG_ALLOC,         
00070      MSG_SENDING,       
00071      MSG_WAIT_ACK,      
00072      MSG_COMPLETE,      
00073 };
00074 
00076 struct msg {
00077     struct msg *next;                    
00078     enum emsg_state state;               
00079     uint8_t flags;                     
00080     uint8_t len;                       
00081 #ifndef FB_RF
00082     uint8_t data[MSG_MAX_DATA_LENGTH];   
00083 #else
00084     uint8_t block1[RF_BLOCK1_LENGTH];                
00085     uint8_t data[MSG_MAX_DATA_LENGTH]; 
00086     uint8_t rfdata[RF_BLOCK2_LENGTH+RF_BLOCK3_LENGTH-MSG_MAX_DATA_LENGTH];
00088 #endif
00089     uint8_t repeat;                      
00090 };
00091 
00092 /**************************************************************************
00093 * DECLARATIONS
00094 **************************************************************************/

00096 
00097 /*************************************************************************
00098 * FUNCTION PROTOTYPES
00099 **************************************************************************/
00100 MSG_EXT void msg_queue_init(void);
00101 MSG_EXT struct msg* AllocMsgI(void);
00102 MSG_EXT void dequeuemsg(struct msg* *ptr);
00103 MSG_EXT void queuemsg(struct msg* *ptr, struct msg *pmsg, void (*trigger)(void));
00104 
00105 
00106 /**************************************************************************
00107 * IMPLEMENTATION
00108 **************************************************************************/
00109 
00116 static inline void FreeMsg(struct msg* pmsg)
00117 {
00118     free(pmsg);
00119 }
00120 
00127 static inline struct msg* AllocMsg(void)
00128 {
00129     struct msg* ret;
00130 
00131     DISABLE_IRQS;
00132 
00133     ret = AllocMsgI();
00134 
00135     ENABLE_IRQS;
00136 
00137     return ret;
00138 }
00139 
00140 
00148 static inline uint8_t isQueueEmpty(struct msg* *ptr)
00149 {
00150    return ((*ptr) ? FALSE : TRUE);
00151 }
00152 #endif /* _MSG_QUEUE_H */
